summary: Guess who’s drawing smutty Critical Role fanart so she can engrave it on leather and make an actual Tusk Love bookcover to carry...
caption:
Guess who’s drawing smutty Critical Role fanart so she can engrave it on leather and make an actual Tusk Love bookcover to carry around when she’s cosplaying as Jester in a month! :D

Livestream this wednesday! I’ll be painting this pretty cover and you can help out in the chat!

summary: You think you can just get away with offering us the chance to back our beloved Campaign 1 characters to become animated ones...
body:
You think you can just get away with offering us the chance to back our beloved Campaign 1 characters to become animated ones and not have your heads spin by the amount of support you’ll be getting (I hope they have stretch, stretch, stretch, stretch goals in mind)

CHALLENGE ACCEPTED

For some reason I foresee this Kickstarter for the Vox Machina animated special break it’s goal in the first few hours and will probably break 1 million dollars before the day is through. Critters.

reblog.comment:

tags: i'm not tagging everyone individually i'm sorry
summary: I love this ‘casual character cosplay’ photo just like they did for Vox Machina, you can see the little details inspired by the...
caption:
I love this ‘casual character cosplay’ photo just like they did for Vox Machina, you can see the little details inspired by the characters

  • Tal is bones and flowers for his two graveyard boys
  • Laura is all strawberries with a donut necklace
  • Marisha is going to personally remake Kill Bill
  • Ashley looks like every teenage queer girl’s dream gf
  • Liam has Caleb’s books (and some red for the fire boy)
  • Matt wearing his ‘signature’ DM look with vest and leather bracelets

Meanwhile Tavis and Sam sure do have on some nice sweaters

summary: Matt: Ok, while your character is out of the campaign you’re gonna need a new one and-- Travis and Sam: I wanna be Percy  Matt:...
body:
Matt: Ok, while your character is out of the campaign you’re gonna need a new one and–

Travis and Sam: I wanna be Percy 

Matt: Ok? 

Travis and Sam: But like, times 10
